definition: lit. the barefooted people are not afraid of those who wear shoes (idiom)/fig. the poor, who have nothing to lose, do not fear those in power
pinyin: guang1 jiao3 de5 bu4 pa4 chuan1 xie2 de5

definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
